Exercise may `` train '' body repair deoxyribonucleic acid ( DNA ) damage efficiently , may reduce symptom relate platinum-based chemotherapy , improve quality life , increase survival , decrease recurrence rate patient ovarian cancer .
DOC.brief_title: An Exercise Intervention Trial Reduce Symptoms & Improve Clinical Outcomes Platinum-Based Treatment Ovarian Cancer Patients
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . To assess feasibility recruit enrol newly diagnose epithelial ovarian cancer patient undergone debulking surgery start platinum-based chemotherapy , exercise trial . II . To evaluate adherence data collection exercise trial protocol . It necessary determine feasibility collect tablet-based questionnaire data blood sample multiple time point one visit . It also critical determine whether exercise intervention feasible patient population . SECONDARY OBJECTIVES : I . To examine change DNA repair function single exercise session . II . To examine change DNA repair function , body composition , quality life , symptoms patient satisfaction care treatment time course . III . To examine effect exercise intervention measurement . IV . To follow patient additional 12-months clinical outcome define death , cancer recurrence , new primary cancer . OUTLINE : Patients undergo supervise 1-on-1 exercise session 60 minute day 1.Treatment repeat every 3 week 18 week absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients also receive home-based exercise prescription include instruction keep patient ' heart rate within 50-80 % maximum . After completion study , patient follow 12 month .
